text:
PNG assets are not made available for insert as an image into bxeng for instance.
Following patches resolve this:

1. image.xsl
2. asset.xsl


--- lenya/xslt/bxeng/image.xsl.orig     2004-05-05 22:14:40.000000000 +0200
+++ lenya/xslt/bxeng/image.xsl  2004-05-16 01:07:23.000000000 +0200
@@ -164,7 +164,7 @@
                                     <xsl:for-each select="lenya-info:asset">
                                         <xsl:choose>
                                             <xsl:when
-                                                test="contains(dc:title, 'jpg')
or contains(dc:title, 'gif')">
+                                                test="contains(dc:title, 'jpg')
or contains(dc:title, 'gif') or contains(dc:title, 'png')">
                                                 <tr>
                                                     <td
                                                         colspan="2">



--- lenya/xslt/authoring/asset.xsl.orig 2004-05-15 17:04:01.000000000 +0200
+++ lenya/xslt/authoring/asset.xsl      2004-05-16 00:46:48.000000000 +0200
@@ -276,7 +276,7 @@
       <xsl:choose>
           <!-- filter non-images for image upload -->
           <xsl:when test="$insertimage = 'true'">
-            <xsl:if test="contains(., 'jpg') or contains(., 'gif')">
+            <xsl:if test="contains(., 'jpg') or contains(., 'gif') or
contains(., 'png')">
               <option><xsl:value-of select="."/></option>
             </xsl:if>
           </xsl:when>
creator: t.hartwig@crapoud.com
